hymn.title: God holds the key of all unknown
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Hands

layout.singingstanza: God holds the key of all un -- known, And I am glad; If oth -- er hands should hold the key, Or if He trust -- ed it to me, I might be sad. I might be sad.

lyrics.stanza: God holds the key of all unknown, And I am glad; If other hands should hold the key, Or if He trusted it to me, I might be sad.
What if tomorrow's cares were here, Without its rest? I'd rather He unlocked the day, And, as the hours swing open, say, My will is best.
The very dimness of my sight Makes me secure; For, groping in my misty way, I feel His hand; I hear Him say, My help is sure.
I cannot read His future plans; But this I know: I have the smiling of His face, And all the refuge of His grace While here below.
